match_types.name: Standard
match_types.description: The standard singles match. Win by pinfall or submission.

match_types.name: No DQ
match_types.description: No disqualifications / count-outs! Win by pinfall or submission only.

match_types.name: Cage
match_types.description: The wrestlers are locked in a cage and winner is the first to reach the floor.

match_types.name: Ladder
match_types.description: A belt is suspended above the ring over a ladder. The winner must climb the ladder and retrieve the belt.
